@NorthantsSCIU @Northants_RPU @DVSAEnforcement @EnvAgency Certainly a line of enquiry. We will also be further speaking with @DVSAEnforcement with regards to driving whilst under prohibition üëç
@simonh_s @Feargal_Sharkey @AquiferChalk @Chilternstreams @RussellB1ggs @EnvAgency @Cambswater It does look heavier than water.

tweets.text: @NP_PC1604 @Northants_RPU @DVSAEnforcement I wonder if the @EnvAgency would be interested in the details of this one also!

The @EnvAgencySE have declared a FLOOD ALERT for the River Thames from Hurley to Cookham "flooding of low lying roads and farmland is expected this evening, 06/10/2020, especially in the Marlow area https://t.co/qF3Vhlb9EG

Intercepted a vehicle with @Northants_RPU Its clear to see why @DVSAEnforcement prohibited it!

We have made certain that it won't be going any further & #seized it!

‚ùå Dangerous Condition
‚ùå Obscured Numberplate 

More detailed checks also revealed no insurance #OpJourney https://t.co/JrG98dSQen https://t.co/B45xMu7LEK

#Waterquality of English rivers has been a #hottopic.

The @EnvAgency has revealed a failing water standard across England, while @Feargal_Sharkey is set to launch a legal campaign for the water quality of rivers.

So, what's the real problem? Take a read‚û°Ô∏èhttps://t.co/fToTHzDESj https://t.co/axcAm0xcCa
Have you signed up to receive flood alerts? Heavy rain is likely overnight, we‚Äôll issue flood alerts and warnings as necessary. https://t.co/SWKeGhiyBh https://t.co/qgqG6FJL3u

Looks like the sunshine is back in the south east! If you‚Äôre out by our waterways, remember the ground might still be a bit slippery after all the rain. Here‚Äôs some advice from our friends @CanalRiverTrust on staying safe on towpaths. https://t.co/FOBz1PuDWn

tweets.text: We've had reports of sewage discharges around Aylesbury and Chinnor areas as a result of recent storm events. @thameswater and @EnvAgency are investigating but please be aware and if you see any signs of pollution call Thames Water 0800 3169800 or EA on 0800 807060

The Field Team is still out clearing up after Storm Alex at the weekend. 

Today they‚Äôve removed trees from the tree catchers at Morpeth. 

Catching trees here prevents them from blocking bridges and restricting flow in the town, reducing flood risk. 

#StormAlex 
#Flood https://t.co/He64nZT3ND

The @EnvAgency manages a number of Risk of Flooding layers which are now available through the @LivingAtlas. These layers may complement your own understanding of different types of flood risk from rivers and sea or surface water extent across the UK: https://t.co/ZUnlyMaacU https://t.co/U42aSegoVa

Yesterday saw another milestone met in the delivery of @EnvAgencyMids Keadby Pumping Station with the first run of the newly installed Pump 1. Site testing and commissioning will continue over the next two weeks to fine tune and test the pump‚Äôs operation. https://t.co/9wyruoeKBr

Sadly increased #flood risk again for #Merseyside #Lancashire #GreaterManchester #Cheshire which are of course those parts that had it worst yesterday. Pls do be #floodaware & sign up to @EnvAgencyNW #flood warnings. #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/BkkqV0gF8M

Augmentation at Ivel Springs is therefore essential, but not at feeble 0.4 ML rate proposed by @AffinityWater - which is less even than the Q90 figure calculated by @EnvAgency. The new borehole must have capacity to augment at 5 ML.
@EnvAgency talk of cost-benefit analysis and say reducing over-abstraction is too expensive. Only a token cap on abstraction at Baldock will be applied.
@EnvAgency  guy: "They're 'Poor' status in the River Basin Management Plan. That's a fact. We can't deny that. The cost of addressing that has been deemed disproportionately too high as it is."
@EnvAgency guy: "We know that all of these ground water bodies for the west of our area (EAnglia) are failing presently to meet their environmental objectives."
@EnvAgency guy: "We know that most of our ground water bodies are over-licensed, over-abstracted."

@WCL_News @WildlifeTrusts @RSBenwell @ruthmchambers @Goodwin_Pip @GreenAllianceUK @RSPBNews @GreenerUK_ @DefraGovUK @DefraNature @pow_rebecca @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @10DowningStreet üåéüåøAnd we need to embed sustainability from the ground up: https://t.co/ZiTkuk1tER
